UML:TaggedValue.value: Implements basic database operations over OrderIn objects.

$XREFPROP=$XID={BA243E78-B221-436a-852E-91453303EF12}$XID;$NAM=Stereotypes$NAM;$TYP=element property$TYP;$VIS=Public$VIS;$PAR=0$PAR;$DES=@STEREO;Name=interface;@ENDSTEREO;$DES;$CLT={49F65955-124C-4753-8310-457F12D29321}$CLT;$SUP=<none>$SUP;$ENDXREF;
Insert a new order in into the database. @return created order in, with its generated fields filled-out.
the order in to create
Get all the order ins that are in the database. @return all the order ins that are in the database.
Get an order in with the given ID. @return optionally, the order in that's in the database under the given ID
the ID of the searched-for order in.
Remove a line item from the database. This method is located in the OrderInDAO class because line items are completely dependent on their orders
the line item to remove.
Source -> Destination
Implements basic database operations over user objects.

$XREFPROP=$XID={5937EDCD-5BD9-459c-B9F8-F82262E66AC4}$XID;$NAM=Stereotypes$NAM;$TYP=element property$TYP;$VIS=Public$VIS;$PAR=0$PAR;$DES=@STEREO;Name=interface;@ENDSTEREO;$DES;$CLT={5E484D72-FE18-44e5-B71B-B52474000FED}$CLT;$SUP=<none>$SUP;$ENDXREF;
Insert a new user into the database. @return inserted user, with its generated fields filled-out.
the user to insert
Get the user with the given ID. @return optionally the user that's in the database under the given ID
the ID of the searched-for user.
Get the user which can sign in using the given PIN code @return optionally the user that can sign in using pin.
PIN code according to which to get the user
Source -> Destination

Implements getting ProductPosition lists for products. Since ProductPosition is not represented on the database level, this class doesn't have any of the creation and advanced querying methods from other DAOs.

$XREFPROP=$XID={23DB4C21-3E2D-4339-9FC5-1AAE0600A053}$XID;$NAM=Stereotypes$NAM;$TYP=element property$TYP;$VIS=Public$VIS;$PAR=0$PAR;$DES=@STEREO;Name=interface;@ENDSTEREO;$DES;$CLT={983FCC74-255E-441d-8AAD-BD5381C1E07E}$CLT;$SUP=<none>$SUP;$ENDXREF;
Get ProductPositions for the product with the given ID. @return a list of ProductPositions where the product is currently located.
ID of the product to get positions for
Source -> Destination
Implements basic database operations over Product objects.

$XREFPROP=$XID={D44015ED-36B3-456e-94C5-88FF3E00B2DC}$XID;$NAM=Stereotypes$NAM;$TYP=element property$TYP;$VIS=Public$VIS;$PAR=0$PAR;$DES=@STEREO;Name=interface;@ENDSTEREO;$DES;$CLT={CCE3AF49-6E74-4767-AF53-CC9CD945AFF8}$CLT;$SUP=<none>$SUP;$ENDXREF;
Insert a new product into the database. @return created product, with its generated fields filled-out.
the product to create
Get all the products that are in the database. @return all the products that are in the database.
Get a product with the given ID. @return optionally the product that's in the database under the given ID
the ID of the searched-for product.
Source -> Destination
Implements basic database operations over ProductMovement objects.

the product movement to create

the ID of the searched-for product movement.
Source -> Destination
